verses.name: Jeremiah 33:1
verses.text: Moreover the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah the second time, while he was yet shut up in the court of the prison, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord the maker thereof, the Lord that formed it, to establish it; the Lord is his name;

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:3
verses.text: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.

verses.name: Jeremiah 33:4
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord, the God of Israel, concerning the houses of this city, and concerning the houses of the kings of Judah, which are thrown down by the mounts, and by the sword;
